Deoxys (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
If you were looking for the TCG set, see EX Deoxys (TCG).
← #0385: Jirachi
Pokémon
#0387: Turtwig →

Deoxys has been featured on 34 different cards since it debuted in the EX Deoxys expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Deoxys cards are normally Psychic-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Deoxys

Deoxys
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
